entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NETSDK1138 should not be raised for libraries #28518
    7.0.3xx
  • dotnet build -disable-build-servers is not working #25536
    7.0.3xx

Updated

  • Dotnet format fails with EnforceCodeStyleInBuild enabled in 7.0.200 #30742
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • Is System.drawing.common vulnerable to CVE-2021-24112 in .Net SDK 6.0 #29927
  • dotnet publish -p:PublishSingleFile fails with Unhandled exception on .net 7 it works on .net 6 #30758
  • Consume NuGet /embed assets group for interop type assemblies from NuGet package #2732
    7.0.3xx
  • dotnet-watch needs to be updated to newer analyzers #30786
  • Build fails when using sdk version 7.0.200 #30625
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base interfaces if type argument/s are filtered out. #30805
  • Improve error messages reported when a workload is missing #30230
  • Breaking change inside v7.0.200 - MSBuild Preview version used !? #30624
  • PublishAOT property causes build failure when used with earlier TFMS in `TargetFrameworks` property #30814
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass additional arguments through when Hot Reload is enabled #30866
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30857
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30854
  • edit: `applyPathes` -> `applyPatches` #30852
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base interfaces if type argument/s are filtered out. #30851
    Area-GenAPI
  • Remove scrubbing the warning for furhter observation #30841
  • Report corrupted global settings #30839
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832

Merged

  • Update Pre-Release Version to 3 For Main #30859
  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 24004: Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #30615
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
  • GenAPI: improve error handling, extend test coverage. #30803
    Area-GenAPI
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2122460 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test, DO NOT MERGE
  • [7.0.2xx Servicing] Fix Property Parsing in `publish` and `pack` #30826
  • [Breaking Backport] Fix Encoding On Non EN Languages #30823
  • Investigate https://github.com/dotnet/templating/issues/5921 #30732
